_ui.title: Label
_ui.description: A label for sample, or name of an individual animal (e.g., Clint).

_ui.title: Isolate Name
_ui.description: Identification or description of the specific individual from which this sample was obtained.

_ui.title: Breed
_ui.description: Breed name - chiefly used in domesticated animals or plants.

_ui.title: Cultivar
_ui.description: Cultivar name - cultivated variety of plant.

_ui.title: Package
_ui.description: Name of attribute package used to validate the sample, for example: MIGS.ba.air.4.0.                See https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/biosample/docs/packages/ for the full list of available packages.
